subject: Football
Tests (Drug Use)
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Jimmy Kennedy, a defensive tackle for the Giants, was suspended for four games last month for violating the N.F.L.’s performance-enhancing drug policy.
snippet: Jimmy Kennedy, a defensive tackle for the Giants, was suspended for four games last month for violating the N.F.L.’s performance-enhancing drug policy.
